FuncDef:
The pim ignore dr-state command enables an interface to ignore the PIM DR state.
The undo pim ignore dr-state command restores the default configuration.
By default, an interface is not enabled to ignore the PIM DR state.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a VRRP backup group for multicast services, if the interfaces on both the master and a backup device are Up, RBS hot backup is not required, and a Layer 2 device learns both of the interfaces as router interfaces and sends protocol packets to the master and backup devices. However, in Layer 3 multicast, PIM outbound interfaces are generated by the PIM DR, and each network segment can have only one PIM DR. To allow non-DRs to generate outbound interfaces in such a scenario, run the pim ignore dr-state command to enable an interface to ignore the PIM DR state.
Prerequisites
PIM has been enabled using the pim command.
